articles.author: Ross A. Lincoln
articles.title: Smartmatic Accuses Fox, Rupert Murdoch of Destroying Evidence in $2.7 Billion Defamation Lawsuit Over 2020 Election
articles.description:
Fox News denies the accusations
The post Smartmatic Accuses Fox, Rupert Murdoch of Destroying Evidence in $2.7 Billion Defamation Lawsuit Over 2020 Election appeared first on TheWrap.
